Build-Depends-Arch: libcurl4-openssl-dev | libcurl-dev, libinih-dev, meson (>= 0.53.0), pkg-config, systemd [linux-any]
Description: dynamically update a DNS record using Cloudflare cloudflare-ddns is a oneshot program: you run it, it updates the DNS record, and it terminates. This uses Cloudflare's API, so to run the tool you'll need an API token and the Zone ID of the DNS zone that you want to update.
Package-List: cloudflare-ddns deb admin optional arch=any libcloudflare-ddns-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libcloudflare-ddns2 deb libs optional arch=any
